ARABIC: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِى ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Proceed to a shadow which forks into three
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Go to the shadow with three ramifications,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Proceed to that shadow, rising in three columns
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Move towards the shadow of the smoke having three branches.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Depart you to a shadow in three columns,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Walk on to the covering having three branches,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Depart unto the shadow falling threefold,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Proceed to a shadow rising in three columns:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Depart Unto the shadow three branched:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Depart ye to a Shadow (of smoke ascending) in three columns,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Depart you to a shadow (of Hell-fire smoke ascending) in three columns,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Depart into the shadow of three masses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Proceed to a shadow of three different masses.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:30] Depart to a triple-forked shadow — this is the smoke of Hell, which, as it rises, splits into three parts because of its magnitude —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: The angels who are the keepers of the Fire will say to them after the end of reckoning: (Depart) deniers (unto the shadow) caused by the smoke of the Fire (falling threefold) three groups.
